sentences.en: And indeed we have proceeded in accordance with this keynote ever since.
sentences.cn: 以后实际上就是按这个调子走的.

sentences.en: Eve: And the keynote speaker was really good, too.
sentences.cn: 伊芙: 而且主讲人说得也很棒.

sentences.en: He would be setting out his plans for the party in a keynote speech.
sentences.cn: 他将在一次主题发言中陈述他对该政党的规划。

sentences.en: I've been following your career for years, I - I can't wait for your keynote speech.
sentences.cn: 我关注您已经多年, 我简直等不及要听你这次的报告了.

sentences.en: Oh, my God, you really want me to be the keynote speaker?
sentences.cn: 我的天啊你真的要我当主讲人 吗 ?

sentences.en: She picked up the gauntlet in her incisive Keynote Address to the Conference.
sentences.cn: 在大会主题发言中，她言辞犀利地回应挑战。

sentences.en: Some of these programs offer keynote speakers who have actually caused fatalities.
sentences.cn: 而那些主讲人就有一部分是引起交通事故.

sentences.en: The governor will keynote the convention.
sentences.cn: 州长将发表施政方针的演说.

sentences.en: The keynote of her speech was that we need higher wages.
sentences.cn: 她发言的重点是我们需要加薪.

sentences.en: The keynote of his speech is that we need peace.
sentences.cn: 他的演说重点是我们需要和平.

sentences.en: The keynote of his speech was that we need peace.
sentences.cn: 他发言的重点是我们需要和平.

sentences.en: The keynote of his speech was unity.
The keynote of the Minister's speech was the need for higher productivity.
sentences.cn: 该部长演说的要旨是高度生产力的需要.

sentences.en: The mayor will keynote the convention.
sentences.cn: 市长将在大会上作主旨发言.

sentences.en: The prime minister delivered the keynote address at the conference.
sentences.cn: 首相在会上作了基调演说.

sentences.en: World peace was the keynote of his speech.
sentences.cn: 世界和平是他演说的要点.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 政治性集会中的政策演讲
主讲人；大会发言人；主讲嘉宾
会上发表的主要讲话；政党代表大会上关于施政方针的演说

trans.tran_en: the main point in a book, system of beliefs, activity etc that influences everything else

trans.tran_cn: 给…定基调；说明基本政策
